Docs.typeparam: The value type to be set for and theme.
Docs.param: The bindable object to SetAppTheme on.
The property to apply to the and values to.
The value to use when the device is configured to use a light theme.
The value to use when the device is configured to use a dark theme.
Docs.summary: Sets the property values for and themes respectively.
Docs.returns: The instance to allow for fluently building the user interface.
